server.js: Entry point. Loads .env, connects to the DB, and starts the Express server on port 3000.
src/app.js: Creates the Express app, applies JSON parsing and CORS middleware, and mounts song-related routes.
src/db/db.js: Mongoose DB connection helper that reads MONGODB_URL and connects to MongoDB.
src/models/song.model.js: Mongoose schema/model for song documents (title, artist, audio URL, mood).
src/routes/song.routes.js: Express routes: POST /songs to upload a song, GET /songs to fetch songs by mood.
src/service/storage.service.js: Uploads file buffers to ImageKit and returns the hosted file metadata (including URL).
package.json: Lists dependencies (express, mongoose, multer, imagekit) used by the backend.
